test_suite.reason: Test runner can handle parallel tests

tasks.title: Setup ESM configuration and Node 20+ requirements
tasks.description: Configure package.json for ES modules, update Node engine requirements, setup import map

expected_complexity.breakdown: Package.json updates (20 LoC), import map (15 LoC), scripts (15 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT add any TypeScript or build tooling

scope.restrictions: Only configuration files, no source code

logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, details}

checkpoints: After package.json: Verify ESM imports work

source_evidence.quote: Build DATA as an ESM CLI on Node 20+ (Bun optional)

tasks.title: Create data-core package with pure JavaScript
tasks.description: Initialize data-core package with port interfaces in JavaScript using JSDoc for type documentation

expected_complexity.breakdown: Port interfaces (100 LoC), JSDoc types (50 LoC), package setup (50 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT implement logic yet - only interfaces

logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, details}

checkpoints: Before completion: Verify no I/O operations

reuses_existing.rationale: New package with pure JavaScript architecture

source_evidence.quote: Core: no fs, no child_process, no process.env. Accept injected ports

tasks.title: Create data-host-node JavaScript adapters
tasks.description: Implement Node.js host adapters in JavaScript with real fs, spawn, env implementations

expected_complexity.breakdown: Adapters (150 LoC), JSDoc (50 LoC), tests (50 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT integrate with core yet

logging.on_start: Log 'Creating Node.js host adapters in JavaScript'
logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, details}

checkpoints: After fs adapter: Test file operations
After spawn adapter: Test process execution

reuses_existing.rationale: Wrapping Node.js built-ins for dependency injection

tasks.title: Create JavaScript Event Classes with Runtime Validation
tasks.description: Implement event-driven architecture using JavaScript classes with instanceof checks for runtime type safety

expected_complexity.breakdown: Event classes (200 LoC), JSDoc (100 LoC), validation (100 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT migrate all 179 emissions yet

logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, details}

checkpoints: After base class: Test instanceof checks
After event types: Validate runtime safety
Before completion: Test all event types

source_evidence.quote: JavaScript classes provide instanceof checks that actually execute at runtime

tasks.title: Implement SQL graph and diffing in JavaScript
tasks.description: Create pure JavaScript SQL graph builder and diff engine without filesystem dependencies

expected_complexity.breakdown: Graph builder (200 LoC), Diff engine (200 LoC), JSDoc (100 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT implement file reading - use injected data

logging.on_start: Log 'Implementing SQL graph and diff in JavaScript'
logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, metrics}

checkpoints: After diff engine: Test migration generation

reuses_existing.rationale: Reimplementing DiffEngine as pure JavaScript without I/O

acceptance_checks.cmd: cd packages/data-core && npm test -- sql diff

source_evidence.quote: Pure logic: SQL graph, diffing, plan compiler (no fs/spawn)

tasks.title: Create Deno Edge Function template system
tasks.description: Build template generator for Deno-compatible Edge Functions with Web API patterns

expected_complexity.breakdown: Template engine (150 LoC), Templates (150 LoC), Generator (100 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT create runtime - only generators

logging.log_format: JSON with fields: {task_id, timestamp, event, template_name}

reuses_existing.rationale: New functionality for Edge Function generation

tasks.title: Migrate CLI entry point to ESM

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT migrate individual commands yet

tasks.title: Setup AI-powered JSDoc generation pipeline

expected_complexity.breakdown: Hook scripts (50 LoC), Configuration (25 LoC), Documentation (25 LoC)

definition_of_done.stop_when: Do NOT manually write JSDoc everywhere
